name: Signature Gameday Burger
description: A hearty 1/2-pound beef patty piled high with all your game day favorites. This masterpiece features crispy bacon, cheddar cheese, jalape√±os, and a drizzle of spicy homemade sauce.

name: The Classic Burger
description: A juicy 1/2-pound beef patty grilled to perfection, served with lettuce, tomato, onion, and your choice of cheese. Add bacon or avocado for extra flavor.

name: Grilled Chicken Club
description: Grilled chicken breast topped with bacon, Swiss cheese, lettuce, tomato, and mayo on a toasted bun.

name: Veggie Burger
description: A delicious plant-based patty grilled and served with lettuce, tomato, onion, and your choice of cheese.

name: BBQ Pulled Pork Sandwich
description: Slow-cooked pulled pork tossed in tangy barbecue sauce, topped with coleslaw, and served on a toasted brioche bun.
